problem_statement: Given the first term (a), common difference (d), and an integer n, find the nth term of the arithmetic progression.

input_parameters.name: param
input_parameters.description: Three integers: a (first term), d (common difference), and n (the term to find). 0 <= n <= 1000.

output_parameters.name: result
output_parameters.description: The nth term of the arithmetic progression.

coding_guidelines: The solution should be efficient and avoid unnecessary computations.
Consider edge cases and validate input parameters.

problem_statement: Write a function that takes an integer n and returns the nth Fibonacci number.

input_parameters.name: param
input_parameters.description: An integer representing the position (0-based) of the desired Fibonacci number. 0 <= n <= 1000.

coding_guidelines: The solution should be efficient and avoid unnecessary computations.
Consider edge cases and validate input parameters.
